archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Loyalty Subscription Management
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation:
The Loyalty Subscription Management component manages subscription and deactivations to a Loyalty programmes. Subscription management includes - checking customer requirements - assigning one or more subgroups to which the customer belongs - assigning welcome points & send welcome messages - generate the unique Loyalty-identifier
Loyalty Subscription Management can assign multiple traffic channels to loyalty subscriptions (sim-cards, PBX, Call Data Network etc.)
